name: CodePushPatch
description: Update the metadata for an existing release
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: accessKey
inputs.label: Access Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Access key used to authenticate with the CodePush service.

inputs.name: serviceEndpointCodePush
inputs.label: Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: CodePush service endpoint that is configured with your account credentials.

inputs.name: serviceEndpointHockeyApp
inputs.label: Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: HockeyApp service endpoint that is configured with your account credentials.

inputs.name: appName
inputs.label: App Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the app you want to update the release for.

inputs.name: deploymentName
inputs.label: Deployment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the deployment you want to update the release for.

inputs.name: releaseLabel
inputs.label: Release Label
inputs.helpMarkDown: Label of the release to update (e.g. v23). Selecting "Latest" will update the latest release in the specified deployment.

inputs.name: rollout
inputs.label: Rollout
inputs.helpMarkDown: Percentage of users this release should be immediately available to. Selecting "Inherit" will leave this attribute unmodified.

inputs.name: description
inputs.label: Description
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Description of the changes made to the app in this release.
Note: This can be set to **$(Release.ReleaseDescription)** if being run within a release definition, and you want to inherit the release's description. Selecting "Inherit" will leave this attribute unmodified.

inputs.name: appStoreVersion
inputs.label: Target Binary Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Semver expression that specifies the binary app version(s) this release is targetting (e.g. 1.1.0, ~1.2.3). Selecting "Inherit" will leave this attribute unmodified.

inputs.name: isMandatory
inputs.label: Mandatory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether this release should be considered mandatory. Selecting "Inherit" will leave this attribute unmodified.

inputs.name: isDisabled
inputs.label: Disabled
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether this release should be immediately downloadable. Selecting "Inherit" will leave this attribute unmodified.
